description: A parent's punny hope for their son's surgical career.
title: Surgical Hopes
n_1: The parent discusses their son's medical school progress.
n_2: The parent reflects on the challenges of becoming a surgeon.
c1_2: It's not easy, all that precision and pressure.
n_3: Showing a picture of their son in a medical uniform.
c1_3: But if anyone can make the cut, it's him!
n_4: The parent smiles proudly, hopeful for their son's success.
c1_4: I'm sure he'll operate with flying colors!
